title: Himi 553
lyrics:
8.8.8.8.8.8.
1.
Misaia, ‘Alo he ‘Otua,
Naʻe fakatupu talu mu’a,
Ko e Tu’i Koe ‘o e Langi,
Taloni taha mo
e
Tamai:
Na’a mo feohi maʻu mo la,
Tatau he lāngilangi’ia.
2.
Ko hai ‘e lau ‘a e ‘ofa lahi!
Naʻa ke ha’anu ki mamani;
Hu’i ‘a e teunga na’e ‘o’ou,
‘Alo’i ‘e he Tāupo’ou:
‘O talu ai pe ho’ tangata,
‘O ma’u kotoa pe homau anga.
3.
Na’e ‘ikai te ke kalofia,
Pe maa’i homau fatongia;
Na’a ke femili mo e mate,
‘O hifo ki fa’itoka ē:
Ke hae ‘a e songo ‘o e langi,
Kae hū ki ai ‘a ho kakai.
4.
‘Oku mau viki ni kotoa
Ho’ hake leva mei fa’itoka,
Na’a ke hā’ele ki ‘olunga,
‘O ‘ai ho lāngilangi mu’a:
‘O talu ai ho’ pule hena,
Ko e Tu’i Fakaleveleva.
5.
Ko ia ‘oku mau hūfia;
‘E Sīsū, ‘ave ‘emau hia,
Te’eki ke ke hoko mai
Ke fai ‘a e Fakamaau Lahi,
Hā ko homau Taukapo mu’a,
‘O hūfaki’i ki he ‘Otua. *
